thread.title: PCCTC Video Productions and Media Studies to Broadcast 2015 Regular Season Finale: Valparaiso vs. Lake Central Football Live on ValpoLife.com, NWIndianaLife.com
thread.title_full: PCCTC Video Productions and Media Studies to Broadcast 2015 Regular Season Finale: Valparaiso vs. Lake Central Football Live on ValpoLife.com, NWIndianaLife.com

title: PCCTC Video Productions and Media Studies to Broadcast 2015 Regular Season Finale: Valparaiso vs. Lake Central Football Live on ValpoLife.com, NWIndianaLife.com
text:
Written by Porter County Career and Technical Center Last Updated on 16 October 2015 
The Porter County Career and Technical Center's Video Production and Media Studies Class will produce a live video broadcast of the 2015 regular season football finale between the Lake Central Indians and Valparaiso Vikings and will be streamed live on www.ValpoLife.com and www.NWIndianaLife.com . 
Alec Long (Hebron HS) is calling the game with Sam Ridge (Washington Township HS) providing commentary. The production is directed by Rachel Diaz (Portage HS).
